Package GUI

Class FarmModel

java.lang.Object
GUI.FarmModel
public class FarmModel extends Object
This class is the Model for the MyFarm game.

This class functions as the state of the game class.

  • Constructor Details

    • FarmModel

      public FarmModel(String name) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor that creates a new FarmModel object.

      All variables are initialized here.

      Parameters:
      name - name of the player.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - when the files containing vital game object stats are missing.

  • Method Details

    • advanceDay

      public boolean advanceDay()
      This method updates the entirety of plot and increments the day counter.

      This method calls checkStatus() and stores it into the variable status. before doing any updating.

      Returns:
      status.

    • playerUpdate

      public boolean playerUpdate()
      This method calls Player.update().
      Returns:
      Player.update().

    • harvest

      public boolean harvest(int tileIndex)
      This method harvests the plant in the specified tile.

      This method also calls Player.gainExp(double), Player.addObjectCoins(double) and Tile.resetTile() if the harvest is successful. This method checks all relevant checks such as if the Tile object has a Crop object planted or not, and if it is harvestable.

      Parameters:
      tileIndex - Tile object where the harvest operation is to be done
      Returns:
      true if a plant was harvested, false otherwise

    • getHarvestTotal

      public double getHarvestTotal(int tileIndex)
      This method calculates the final harvest total of the tile/crop being harvested.

      This method makes use of getWaterBonus(double, Tile) and getFertBonus(double, Tile)

      Parameters:
      tileIndex - is the Tile with the Crop that is to be harvested
      Returns:
      harvestTotal, the final calculated value of a Crop.

    • plant

      public boolean plant(int plotIndex, int seedIndex)
      This method gets a Crop from seedList and plants it into the specified Tile in plot.

      This method makes use of arePlotSidesEmpty(int) and Player.plant(Crop, Tile). Planting fails if the user tries to plant a Tree into the sides and corners of the plot.

      Parameters:
      plotIndex - the index of the tile in plot where the Crop object will be planted to.
      seedIndex - index of the seed in seedList that will be planted.
      Returns:
      false if planting failed, true otherwise.

    • useTool

      public boolean useTool(int plotIndex, int toolIndex)
      This method calls Player.useTool(Tool, Tile). If the method call returned true then updatePlotMap() is called.
      Parameters:
      plotIndex - index of the Tile object in plot that the tool will be used on.
      toolIndex - index of the tool to be used in toolList.
      Returns:
      true if tool use was successful, false otherwise.

    • upgradePlayer

      public boolean upgradePlayer()
      This method calls Upgradeable.upgrade() and changes player if upgrade was successful.
      Returns:
      true if player was upgraded, false otherwise.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Gets the Player object stored in this class.
      Returns:
      the Player object stored in this class.

    • getPlot

      public Tile getPlot(int i)
      Gets a Tile object stored in plot.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the Tile object stored in plot.
      Returns:
      Tile object stored in index i of plot.

    • getCrop

      public Crop getCrop(int i)
      Gets a Crop object in seedList.
      Parameters:
      i - index of the Crop object in seedList.
      Returns:
      Crop object stored in index i of seedList.

    • checkStatus

      public boolean checkStatus()
      Checks if the game has any active/growing crops in the field.
      Returns:
      true if there are active crops. False otherwise.

    • getTool

      public Tool getTool(int i)
      Gets a Tool in toolList.
      Parameters:
      i - index of a Tool in toolList.
      Returns:
      Tool in index i of toolList.

      Gets the day number
      Returns:
